title: Universe/Evaluables/IpfScalarTimeEvaluable
description: Configuration for IpfScalarTimeEvaluable in evaluables plugin

timescale.description: Timescale of the IPF key (julian day type is instead assumed to be MJD2000)

eventTimescale.description: Timescale of event storage (defaults to universe timescale)

interpOrder.description: Optional interpolation order for the IPF. If not given, hard coded InterpolationDefaults are used.

map.description: map of index, derivative to evaluable names

index.description: index of IPF vector components (starts at 0)

blockEvents.description: Optional flag to include IPF blocks as dynamic events or not

derivOrder.description: derivative order (defaults to 0 for no derivative) derivatives are rescaled to be in IPF state units per second (first derivative), per second squared (second derivative)...
